reviews.title: Loved this hotel!
reviews.text: We recently spent a night at the Hotel New Hiroden, as part of a package with Sunrise Tours.

reviews.title: Clean and comfortable
reviews.text: The hotel is a very short walk from the south-exit of Hiroshima train-station. We emerged from the station, glanced to the right, and could straightaway see the hotel. Also, the bus-station and streetcar depot was right there too: perfect location.

reviews.title: Another good stay at the New Hiroden
reviews.text: This was our third stay at this hotel as part of a Sunrise Tour. (Previous stays, February '06 and February '07.)

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our compact twin room (6135) on the 11th floor was well-equipped, clean and comfortable. From the windows (both of which opened) we had a view of the river and bridge which led in the general direction of Shukkeien Garden, a true oasis of tranquility.
reviews.title: Location location location!

reviews.text: The hotel is very close to the south exit of Hiroshima station, aswell as other transport links, eg, the comprehensive streetcar system. There are shops, restaurants, a post-office etc a short walk away. I especially loved the grocery store in the basement of the Asse shop at the station.
reviews.title: Great place - great location and wonderful staff

likes.liked: — Great location, Internet access and friendly front staff

reviews.text: Hiroshima is a beautiful city and the New Hiroden is a good no-frills base from which to see it.
reviews.title: Well located hotel with friendly staff
Good location and value for money
